name: apk-build-functions
description: GCP Cloud Functions for APK build management

scripts.deploy-build-apk: gcloud functions deploy buildApk --runtime nodejs20 --trigger-http --allow-unauthenticated --region us-central1
scripts.deploy-build-status: gcloud functions deploy buildStatus --runtime nodejs20 --trigger-http --allow-unauthenticated --region us-central1
